originalText.text: I encountered billing issues at Sheryl Clark, MD dermatologist's office, which were resolved with Simon's assistance. If you face billing problems, seek him out, as he proved to be quite helpful. However, my experience with Dr. Sheryl was brief, and it seemed more centered on promoting her cream than addressing my concerns.

text.text: I encountered billing issues at Sheryl Clark, MD dermatologist's office, which were resolved with Simon's assistance. If you face billing problems, seek him out, as he proved to be quite helpful. However, my experience with Dr. Sheryl was brief, and it seemed more centered on promoting her cream than addressing my concerns.

originalText.text: Dr. Clark is professional, caring, and kind. She provides an excellent and personalized level of care, and is incredibly knowledgeable and respectful of patients’ individual situations. I recommend Dr. Clark to anyone and everyone.

text.text: Dr. Clark is professional, caring, and kind. She provides an excellent and personalized level of care, and is incredibly knowledgeable and respectful of patients’ individual situations. I recommend Dr. Clark to anyone and everyone.

originalText.text: Dr. Clark is personable, knowledgeable, caring, and kind. I came in with a body rash and she educated me on my skin and what products and prescriptions would be most effective. I will definitely be back.

text.text: Dr. Clark is personable, knowledgeable, caring, and kind. I came in with a body rash and she educated me on my skin and what products and prescriptions would be most effective. I will definitely be back.

originalText.text: I recently visited Dr. Sheryl Clark’s dermatology practice and I was very impressed with the level of care I received. Dr. Clark took the time to look at me as an individual and asked questions about my needs. She addressed all my concerns and exceeded my expectations.Her staff was also great and made me feel comfortable throughout the entire process. I would highly recommend Dr. Clark to anyone looking for a dermatologist who truly cares about their patients

text.text: I recently visited Dr. Sheryl Clark’s dermatology practice and I was very impressed with the level of care I received. Dr. Clark took the time to look at me as an individual and asked questions about my needs. She addressed all my concerns and exceeded my expectations.Her staff was also great and made me feel comfortable throughout the entire process. I would highly recommend Dr. Clark to anyone looking for a dermatologist who truly cares about their patients

originalText.text: Literally just left her office! What a great experience! Walking in and to the front desk you're kindly greeted by her warm and helpful staff. Office is clean and I was seen not too long after arriving. Dr. Clark came in, introduced herself, and sat down facing me (face and body showed her honest engagement with our interaction). Dr Clark is very friendly, engaging and tailors your needs with various affordable options! As a brown skinned patient with acne and hyperpigmentation needs, I am confident Dr. Clark's services will definitely help me to get clearer skin. I know this because her assessment not only includes what I do on a physical level to treat my skin but she also inquired about my lifestyle, eating habits, emotional/mental stressors. And most importantly, asking me about what treatments (products/services) have previously worked and not worked PRIOR to her giving me her recommendations. I love that! I'll be getting the Sebacia series soon and will provide an update later.
